sourcesContent: import { BankContentContainer, BankDetailsContainer, BankTitleContainer, BrokenHorizontalLine, ButtonHolder, ChargeSummaryContainer, ChargeSummaryContentContainer, Container, GeneratedAccountContainer, GeneratedAccountContentContainer, GeneratedAccountContents, HorizontalLine, ReservationInformationContainer, ReservationInformationContentsContainer} from './Styles' import { Title } from '../../components/title/styles'; import { Button } from '../../components/button/styles'; import React from 'react' function BookingConfirmationCont() { return ( Booking Confirmation Thank you for choosing <b>RM Luxe Hotel</b> Your booking is put on HOLD until confirmation of Bank Deposit/Transfer made <b>Instructions on how to make the payment:</b> Deposit payment through our bank account: <b>Bank: </b> <b>Bank Branch and Address: </b> <b>Bank Swift Code: </b> <b>Bank Routing Code/Sort Key/IFSC: </b> <b>Beneficiary Name: </b> <b>Beneficiary Account Number: </b> BANK NAME Bank Branch Address Bank Swift Code Bank Routing Code/Sort Key/IFSC: Beneficiary Name: Beneficiary Account Number: Please make your deposit, three days before your check-in date to confirm your reservation. Once payment is made, please email the scanned copy of the deposit slip to <b>(COMPANY EMAIL)</b> so we could verify the payment. You will receive a booking confirmation once the payment is verified. For further inquiries, you may call <b>Company number</b> or send an email at <b>Company email</b>. You will find the details of your reservation made below. <b>***IMPORTANT***</b> <b>Generated Account</b> User Name Password <b>: Pedrojuan001221</b> <b>: 232pa3432sad</b> <b>You can use this account to sign in to our website for you to be able to see the status of your bookings and you may also use this user account to send your proof of payment here on our website.</b> <b>Reservation Information</b> Reservation Ref No. Payment Type Guest Name Birthdate Nationality Email Address Address Contact Number Check-In Date Check-Out Date Night(s) Total No. of Rooms Total No. of Guests Special Request(s) <b>: 232pa3432sad</b> <b>: Bank Deposit</b> <b>: Pedro Juan</b> <b>: 2000/12/21</b> <b>: Filipino</b> <b>: PedroJuan@gmail.com</b> <b>: 123 Highway Subdivision</b> <b>: 09292333312</b> <b>: 11/10/2021</b> <b>: 11/14/2021</b> <b>: 4 nights</b> <b>: 1</b> <b>: 2</b> <b>: none</b> <b>Charge Summary</b> Room Charge Total Night(s) : ₱1000 : 4 <b>Grand Total</b> : ₱4000 ) } export default BookingConfirmationCont
